##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0202.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0203.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0210.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0211.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0219.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0253.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext: {}

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0301.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext: {}

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0310.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0311.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext: {}

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0353.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext: {}

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext: {}

---

    name: initcontainer1

  securityContext:

  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause

        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE

        - AUDIT_WRITE

        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0401.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0402.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

        - AUDIT_WRITE

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext: {}

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER

        - KILL

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0 failed:
1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0 failed:
1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0 failed:
1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0 failed:
1 - validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

1 - validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule validate-registries failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/image/

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0485.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0501.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW

kind: Pod

  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:

        - KILL

        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID

        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE

        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0516.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0517.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext: {}

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext: {}

---

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0601.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline064.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext: {}

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline065.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

kind: Pod

      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline067.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

  name: capabilities_baseline0

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1

        - NET_RAW

    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

kind: Pod

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline069.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID

        - SYS_CHROOT

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext: {}

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline070.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0723.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

        add:

        - NET_BIND_SERVICE

        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline075.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

  namespace: default

  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1

        - AUDIT_WRITE

        - KILL

        - NET_BIND_SERVICE

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline079.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0799.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline083.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0 failed:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:

    name: initcontainer1

  securityContext:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:

    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

    runAsNonRoot: true

        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:

        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0864.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext: {}

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext: {}

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline087.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline088.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER

        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

    name: initcontainer1

        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN

        - MKNOD

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline089.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline090.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

kind: Pod

  name: capabilities_baseline0

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:

        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0913.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0921.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0922.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---
